title: ssh: Need to send exit-status/signal channel msg from server
body:
I'm writing a SSH server implementation that uses the Go SSH server. I need to send an
exit-status and exit-signal channel messages upon completion of a server-side task. I
don't see a way of using the exported members to do this. For now, I've written an
extension to the Channel interface that is SendExitStatus(code uint32), but I'm not sure
this makes sense since Channel is also used client-side.

I'd be happy to contribute a patch to implement something acceptable. What do you think
is the right approach? I will eventually also need a way to obtain a parsed
terminal-width and pty-req message.

(Aside: I'm also working on server-side handling of SSH certificates. I'd be happy to
help out with go.crypto/ssh in other areas, too.)
